turkish_example_sentence: Ben o değerli antika vazoyu dikkatle tutmuş olsaydım, kırılmazdı
english_example_sentence: If I had kept that valuable antique vase carefully, it wouldn't have broken
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я держал ту ценную антикварную вазу осторожно, она бы не разбилась
